title: I Cant Apply
body: My computer can never apply i dont now  why but when i click i want to help it doesnt go to the site where i can  apply and when i t works it always says opps ziggs have maybe been here

replies.body:
It sounds like you may encountering trouble reaching the PBE Signup Status Page. If so, I'd recommend taking the steps below as a workaround:

1. In case this is being caused by some leftover data, I recommend [**clearing your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).
2. Visit the [**EUNE Landing Page**](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/) and sign in to your League account.
3. Visit the [**EUNE PBE Signup Page**](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) to check your signup status.
4. ????
5. PROFIT!!!

Let me know if this worked for you. ^.^
Thx so much now i have apply btw can u make me a tester???

I cannot manually check applications, but just a heads-up, we typically look for *really active players* who are a positive influence on the community. You can find a full walkthrough of how the PBE system works and how we choose testers in our [**PBE FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)

If you have any other questions, please let me know.
You can't apply for what? What is it that you are applying for?
